title: Filter selection resets on page reload
notes: Current implementation doesn't persist filter state in session or URL

title: No confirmation after form submission
notes: HTMX shows status in live region (good) but no-JS path gives no feedback (PRG redirect with no message)

title: Changes don't sync across devices
notes: No real-time sync mechanism; users experience data loss when switching devices

title: Touch targets too small on mobile
notes: Checkboxes and buttons below 44x44px minimum; causes accidental clicks and deletions

title: Buttons lack descriptive labels for screen readers
column12: button" without context; needs aria-label or visually hidden text

title: Modal dialogs have keyboard trap
notes: No Escape key handler to close modals; users get trapped with no exit method

title: Layout breaks at 200% zoom
notes: Content disappears or requires horizontal scrolling at high zoom; layout not responsive to text scaling

title: Drag-and-drop is only reordering method
notes: No keyboard or button-based alternative for task reordering; excludes users who can't use drag-and-drop
